880270.name: GeoGebra Mixed Reality
880270.description:
Place math objects in the VR world, walk around them, and take screenshots from different angles. Millions of people around the world use GeoGebra to learn mathematics and science. Join us!

This app includes several examples of 3D math objects that you can place in the VR world. Guided activities lead you to discover math in the real world by taking screenshots from different perspectives.
